pr_title: Extend tracing with provsion to accept message and error as arguments

timeline.bodyText: wouldn't it make more sense to allow any one of them to be null and then just log the non-null argument?
timeline.author: sophokles73
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -159,6 +159,28 @@ public static void logError(final Span span, final String message) { } } + /** + * Marks an OpenTracing span as erroneous, logs a message and an error. + *

+ * This method does not finish the span. + * + * @param span The span to mark. + * @param message The message to log on the span. + * @param error The error to log on the span. + * @throws NullPointerException if message or error is {@code null}.

timeline.message:
Improve tracing by adding a method that accepts message and error as arguments and logs them.

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>
